faqs.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a Vitamin C serum designed to brighten skin and fade dark spots.

faqs.question: What are the key ingredients in this serum?
faqs.answer: It contains Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.

faqs.question: Which skin types is this serum suitable for?
faqs.answer: It is suitable for Oily, Combination skin.

faqs.question: How should I apply this serum in my routine?
faqs.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

faqs.question: Can I use this serum every day?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is generally suitable for daily use if your skin tolerates Vitamin C.

faqs.question: Should I use this in the morning or night?
faqs.answer: You can use it in the morning before sunscreen; some users also use it at night.

faqs.question: Are there any side effects I should know about?
Is this serum suitable for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: People with sensitive skin may experience mild tingling and should patch test first.

faqs.question: Can I use this serum with other active ingredients?
faqs.answer: It contains Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.

faqs.question: What is the price of this serum?
Is this serum good for fading dark spots?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is formulated to help fade dark spots over consistent use.

faqs.question: How does this serum compare to another Vitamin C serum?
faqs.answer: It offers a balanced 10% Vitamin C concentration suitable for oily and combination skin types.

faqs.question: Does this serum offer better hydration than Product B?
faqs.answer: This serum focuses on brightening with added hydration from hyaluronic acid; Product B may focus more on hydration intensity.

faqs.question: Which serum is more affordable, this or Product B?
faqs.answer: This serum is positioned as an affordable brightening option compared to many premium alternatives.

faqs.question: How long will one bottle last if used daily?
faqs.answer: With 2–3 drops used once daily, a typical bottle should last several weeks.
